greetings: Hi there! Thanks for visiting my portfolio site!
about: I'm a software developer and web designer based in Canada!
I love combining creativity with code to build amazing projects.
I graduated from the University of Calgary with a computer science degree.
I'm currently working as a C++ game engineer at a video game company!
projects: Feel free to check out my projects! I've worked on data visualization, HCI research, and more.
I'd love to show you my work! Click on the Projects button to see what I've built.

Check out the Projects section to see my portfolio!
skills: I work with JavaScript, C++, Python, and many other technologies!
My skills include full-stack development, game engineering, and UI/UX design.
I'm experienced in React, Vue, Node.js, and game engines like Frostbite.
I love working on both front-end and back-end development!
